com.silicolife.anote2daemon.controller.publicationsAccess

Class QueriesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.silicolife.anote2daemon.controller.publicationsAccess.QueriesController

  • @RequestMapping(value="/queries")
@ResponseBody
@Controller
public class QueriesController
extends java.lang.Object
    API queries functionalities. All these methods are exposed to the web. It is necessary a user logged to access these methods
    Author:
    Joel Azevedo Costa
